title: Christ in the Desert (Large Figure) (Christus in der Wüste [Grosse Figur])  from Six Lithographs to the New Testament (Sechs Lithographien zum Neuen Testament)
medium: One from a series of six lithographs
dimensions: composition (irreg.): 11 x 9 3/16" (27.9 x 23.4 cm); sheet (irreg.): 22 3/4 x 16 5/16" (57.8 x 41.4 cm)
